title: Go West - A Lucky Luke Adventure [RLLP70] (wbfs)
description:
Go West: A Lucky Luke Adventure

New York , 1855. Lucky Luke escorted the Dalton brothers to their millionth court process . Of course, the four villains escape and attack all banks are so generous in the future Big Apple on their way . With the police in the neck Joe Dalton hides the prey in a covered wagon , however, belongs to a Wagon Train on the way to California. Willy-nilly, must the Daltons with , and be under the watchful eyes of the lonely cowboys all sorts of fun adventures .

FEATURES:
* A brand new story , which is inspired by the original comic book and also predetermines the storyline for the film.
* Thanks to the innovative gameplay , a variety of tasks and the multiplayer is fun to play .
* Uses the new control capabilities of the Wii and the DS : drawing the weapon with a stylus motion or tear with the Wiimote and the nunchuck on the reins of your Gauls .
* Party Mode with up to 4 players on a Wii.
* The combination of Wiimote and Nunchuck is extensively used in the game: Shoot using the controller faster and more accurate than your opponent.
* Compete in mini-games and adventures on the trip across America .
* Play music on an instrument , paint a picture and steer a means of locomotion contained (eg your horse ) .
* After the comics " California or Death" by Morris and Goscinny .
* Game completely in German .
